sqlMap.insert: insert into board(board_no, board_title, board_content, board_writer, board_view, board_regdate) values(#board_no#, #board_title#, #board_content#, #board_writer#, 0, sysdate)
sqlMap.select: select * from board order by board_no desc
sqlMap.update: update board set board_title = #board_title#, board_content = #board_content# where board_no = #board_no#
